--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, <Zardus@n...> wrote:
> Well, any time freezing is extremely annoying in multiplayer 
games. I
> think htat if Openglad becomes a suitable game for mostly 
multiplayer
> things, then the time freezing would have to be either greatly 
reformed or
> diminished a lot.

Freeze Time doesn't WORK in multiplayer games - for glaring proof, 
have a controlled player on a non-Red team cast Freeze Time and 
watch the Freeze Time be as if a Red player cast it.
